features: Perfect Illumination: With evenly distributed point light, handheld mirror creates a clear and shadow-free Illumination and reflects objects perfectly.
High Quality：Made of high-grade glass and sturdy plastic frame, our hand mirror is more durable and high-definition without distortion.
Convenient and Adjustable: No need to charge, just install 4 AAA batteries into handle and press the button on the handle to adjust the brightness of mirror light.
Lightweight and Portable: 6''X11'' lighted hand mirror is only 0.45lb, lightweight enough not only for bedroom, bathroom, salon, barber, but for a travel.
Widely Use: With the help of the ring at handle bottom, lighted mirror can be hung anywhere, very suitable for making up, hair cutting and shaving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the light hand mirror elevated

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This has a light that's on the mirror
reviews.reviewText: I like that it's a light on the mirror and makes it better to see. Putting makeup on is way better because you can see more of the areas that has too much or too less makeup on instead of going and the light and seeing. Uses batteries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light weight mirror
reviews.reviewText: Very light weight hand held mirror. Has 3 light settings. Batteries were easy to install. Required four AAA batteries. Seems like the light should be brighter around the mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS HANDHELD MIRROR!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mirror to use in my locker at work. This mirror is the perfect size for my locker, and I love how bright the light is!! I hate having to put makeup on and fix my hair in the bathroom with the horrible lighting and steam, so I am thrilled that I can do everything at my locker after I work out.I love that this mirror takes AAA batteries. The bottom line is that batteries last so much longer than charging. Plus, I don't want to have to charge the mirror every few days, and I doubt it would be this bright after charging. Seriously, this light is BRIGHT!! It has three settings, and they're all bright, but my favorite is the warm light. It is very flattering. The mirror is also lightweight, so I'm not afraid the hook will unstick, and the mirror will come crashing down in my locker.Overall, this is a great mirror; it's a good size, and the handle makes it easy to hold, or you can do what I did and hang it from a hook. But I promise you, the brightness of the light will make it all worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Mirror to hang or hold
reviews.reviewText: Here’s a versatile high quality plastic mirror that can hang from a hook or nail, or be handheld. It’s the size you can put your make up on or fix your hair. The lights are wonderful. I was shocked that 4 AAA batteries could fit in the handle but they do. It was easy to open and close the battery cover, which these aging hands appreciate.The lights are bright and you can adjust it from super bright to softer and warmer. This is a very well constructed mirror! I wish it came with a layer of protection, like a cloth bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, convenient, great mirror
reviews.reviewText: Handheld mirrors like this aren't something we purchase often, but when we pulled the mirror out of the bag after a recent trip the old one was broken. I went straight to Amazon and was pleased to find this one that even has a light all the way around the edge. We dug up four AAA batteries (always have plenty of batteries on hand) and installed them in the handle, pressed the button and "Voila!" - it works. My wife loves this one and we'll definitely pack it a little better on future trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This Handheld Mirror Is Such A Lifesaver! I’ve Never Seen An Handheld Mirror Have An LED Light On It So I Was Excited About That, It’s Very Lightweight, Convenient, And Portable. This Mirror Does Take 4 Triple A Batteries So Keep That In Mind. It Has A Hook On The Bottom Of The Handle So You Can Hook It In The Shower Or Wherever You Want It. The Size Of The Mirror Is Also Great, I Love That It’s Wide So You Can See Everything! Overall 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mirror, Lights work for close up
reviews.reviewText: Good inexpensive mirror, Big enough for personal useThe built in lights work on close upI got the LED Point version, lights do their job but only up closeYou hold it like 5 inches sway for the lights to do their jobI like that its lightweight, feels sturdy enough in your hand(note batteries not included)
